titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of the Rt Honorable John Earl of Rochester, who died at Woodstock-Park, July 26, 1680, and was buried at Spilsbury in Oxford-shire, Aug. 9 by Robert Parsons ...
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1647-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Theater for Richard Davis and Tho. Bowman,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
